sen.j: 御霊神社（ごりょうじんじゃ）は、京都府福知山市のほぼ中心部にある神社。
sen.e: Goryo-jinja is a shrine located at about the center of Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Goryo-jinja is a shrine located at about the center of Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Goryo-jinja is a shrine located at about the center of Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 福知山市内の市街地のうち、旧城下町の北西にあたる場所にある。
sen.e: It is located at the northwest of the old castle town in the urban area of Fukuchiyama City.
It is located in the northwest of the old castle town in the urban area of Fukuchiyama City.
It is located in the northwest of the old castle town in the urban area of Fukuchiyama City.

sen.j: 広小路通りを塞ぐように境内と、隣接する御霊公園が存在しているため、広小路通りはこの周辺で南北でクランク (道路)状に迂回している。
sen.e: Being obstructed by the precincts and the neighboring Goryo Park, Hirokoji Street is divided into the north and the south one with crankles.
Being obstructed by the precincts and the neighboring Goryo Park, Hirokoji Street is divided into north and south like a crank.
Being obstructed by the precincts and the neighboring Goryo Park, Hirokoji Street is divided into north and south like a crank.
It was founded in 1705.
It was founded in 1705.
It was founded in 1705.

sen.j: もともと宇賀御霊大神を祀る神社ではあったが、福知山城主朽木氏が明智光秀の合祀を許したことに名前を由来する。
sen.e: It was originally dedicated to Uganomitama no Okami, but the name of the shrine comes from the fact that the Kutsuki clan,lord of Fukuchiyama-jo Castle, gave permission to the enshrinement of Mitsuhide AKECHI.

It was originally dedicated to Uganomitama no Okami, but the name of the shrine comes from the fact that the Kutsuki clan, lord of Fukuchiyama-jo Castle, gave permission to the enshrinement of Mitsuhide AKECHI.

It was originally dedicated to Uganomitama no Okami, but the name of the shrine comes from the fact that the Kutsuki clan, lord of Fukuchiyama-jo Castle, gave permission to the enshrinement of Mitsuhide AKECHI.

sen.j: 「福智山」を名付け、福知山城を近世の城に改修し、善政をしいた明智光秀にまつわる数多くの史料を有する。
sen.e: The shrine houses a number of historical records associated with Mitsuhide AKECHI, who named the mountain 'Fukuchi-yama', repaired the Fukuchiyama castle and governed well.
The shrine houses a number of historical records associated with Mitsuhide AKECHI, who named the mountain 'Fukuchi-yama,' repaired Fukuchiyama castle and governed well.
The shrine houses a number of historical records associated with Mitsuhide AKECHI, who named the mountain 'Fukuchi-yama,' repaired Fukuchiyama-jo castle and governed well.

sen.j: 明智光秀の書いた古文書3つが市指定の文化財となっている。
sen.e: The three old documents written by Mitsuhide AKECHI are city-designated cultural assets.
The three old documents written by Mitsuhide AKECHI are city-designated cultural assets.
The three old documents written by Mitsuhide AKECHI are city-designated cultural assets.

sen.j: 参道である広小路通りは、両サイドに商店が建ち並ぶ商店街となっている。
sen.e: The Hirokoji Street, a sando (approach to the shrine), is a shopping street lined with many shops on both sides.
The Hirokoji Street, a sando (approach to the shrine), is a shopping street lined with many shops on both sides.
The Hirokoji Street, a sando (approach to the shrine), is a shopping street lined with many shops on both sides.

sen.j: さらに広小路通りの脇道にも新町商店街などの商店街がある。
sen.e: There are shopping street such as Shinmachi Shotengai (Shinmachi Shopping Street) on the side roads of the Hirokoji Street.
There are shopping streets such as Shinmachi Shotengai (Shinmachi Shopping Street) on the side roads of Hirokoji Street.
There are shopping streets such as Shinmachi Shotengai (Shinmachi Shopping Street) on the side roads of Hirokoji Street.
Nijuhassui (flood in the 28th year of the Showa period)
Nijuhassui (flood in the 28th year of the Showa period)
Nijuhassui (flood in the 28th year of the Showa period)

sen.j: 昭和28年の昭和28年台風第13号の被害による由良川の氾濫で水没した福知山。
sen.e: In the 28th year of the Showa period, Fukuchiyama was flooded with water from Yura-gawa River caused by the 13th typhoon of the year. In order to pass on the tragedy,there is a board which indicate the water level in the city at that time in the Goryo Park contiguous to the precincts.

In the 28th year of the Showa period, Fukuchiyama was flooded with water from the Yura-gawa River caused by the 13th typhoon of the year. In order to pass on the tragedy, there is a board which indicates the water level in the city at any time in Goryo Park contiguous to the precincts.
In the 28th year of the Showa period, Fukuchiyama was flooded with water from the Yura-gawa River caused by the 13th typhoon of the year.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処

sen.j: その被害を伝えるため、境内隣接の御霊公園には当時福知山市街地を覆った水の水位を記した看板が建てられている。
sen.e: In order to pass on the tragedy, there is a board which indicates the water level in the city at that time in Goryo Park contiguous to the precincts.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処原文に合わせ修正

sen.j: 10月の例大祭においては、併せて「丹波光秀ききょうまつり」が開催される。
sen.e: During the Annual Festival in October, 'Tanba Mitsuhide Kikyo(a balloon flower) Festival' is also held.
During the Annual Festival in October, 'Tanba Mitsuhide Kikyo (a balloon flower) Festival' is also held.
During the Annual Festival in October, 'Tanba Mitsuhide Kikyo (a balloon flower) Festival' is also held.

sen.j: 福知山市の秋の代表的お祭りである。
sen.e: This is a major autumn festival of Fukuyama City
This is a major autumn festival of Fukuyama City.
This is a major autumn festival of Fukuchiyama City.

sen.j: 御霊公園、広小路通りには、イベントや数多くの出店が並ぶ。
sen.e: Goryo Park and Hirokoji Street are full of events and stalls during that time.
Goryo Park and Hirokoji Street are full of events and stalls during that time.
